message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for $120. I believe it's a great deal for the value it provides. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $120 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $90?
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I appreciate your offer, but I can't go below $110. This product is high quality and worth the price. What do you say?
I'm still interested in the product, but I really can't go above $90. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $100?
